enWisdom: Knowledge is loftiness, ignorance is misguidance
Every time the knowledge of a person increases, his concern for his soul increases, and he exerts his efforts in training and reforming it
Knowledge is the lamp of the intellect

Wisdom: الْعِلْمُ أَفْضَلُ شَرَفِ مَنْ لَا قَدِيمَ [قَدِمَ‏] لَهُ
enWisdom: Knowledge is the greatest honour for the one who has no [honourable] past
The most honourable of honours is knowledge
There is no honour like knowledge
Knowledge is the leader of forbearance
There is no distinction more honourable than knowledge

Wisdom: الْعِلْمُ جَمَالٌ لَا يَخْفَى وَنَسِيبٌ لَا يَجْفَى
enWisdom: Knowledge is a beauty that does not remain concealed and a relation that does not abandon you (or that is not hidden)
Knowledge is the better of the two beauties
Indeed the only thing that has made people disinclined to seeking knowledge is the frequency with which they observe that only a few people act upon what they know
How good a companion of forbearance knowledge is!
